text: Ferreira Gomes () is a municipality located in the center of the state of Amapá in Brazil. Its population is 6,714 and its area is . The municipality contains 3.64% of the Amapá State Forest, a sustainable use conservation unit established in 2006. It also contains 44.07% of the Amapá National Forest, a sustainable use conservation unit created in 1989. ==References== Category:Municipalities in Amapá
title: Ferreira Gomes
